title: By the King a proclamation concerning tobacco.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,
notes: Forbidding foreign and domestic tobacco; all tobacco from Virginia and other colonies must pass customs at London.
"Giuen at Our Court at Whitehall, the sixt day of Ianuary, in the  sixt yeere of Our Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
